channel.title: python on LC
channel.description: Recent content in python on LC

item.title: Local Data Analytics Stack (Airflow + Superset)
item.description: At work, the BI environment is often setup and ready to go. At home, when I need to do data analysis myself, it really helps if there’s data pipeline and visualization tools ready to go. Over time, I’ve developed my go-to open source data analytics stack that runs on my local machine. The repo: https://github.com/l1990790120/local-data-stack is self-contained. In this post, I’ll share a bit more details on how it works and how to use it.

item.title: Classify Unbalanced Cases with Harvard edX MOOC Dataset
item.description: I’ve run a couple classification ML algorithm on the dataset. What makes this problem interesting is that most of the students did not pass the course. I’ve re-sampled the positive cases multiple times to make the algorithms punish the false positive cases more severely.

item.title: Draw with US College Data
item.description: Showcase on what you can do with IPEDS data API. Choropleth with d3. I’ve also tried this on beaker notebook. More details to come!

item.title: Kaggle's Airbnb New User Booking Trend
item.description: Using mpld3 to do visualization in ipython with Kaggle’s airbnb data. First experience is great!

item.title: College Enrollment Forecast (Institution Level)
item.description: Using ARIMA to forecast college enrollment for 2015 and 2016 at institution level.

item.title: College Enrollment Forecast (State Level)
item.description: Using ARIMA to forecast college enrollment for 2015 and 2016 at state level.
